attributes.action: For our Electoral system to be changed to Proportional Representation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Proportional Representation....To change our voting system away from the "two party" system that we have currently. Instead create proportional representation where every vote is considered in the country to elect the party wanted by the most voters rather than selecting local individuals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
